title: Analyze Terminal Productivity
description: A port analyst needs to generate a weekly report on crane productivity.

tasks.description: Retrieve the operational data for all quay cranes from the past week, including moves per hour and downtime.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst successfully queries the TOS database for the required data.

tasks.description: Calculate the average gross moves per hour (GMPH) for each crane and for the terminal as a whole.
tasks.expected_outcome: The correct GMPH figures are calculated.

tasks.description: Generate a report with charts showing the productivity trends and any cranes that are underperforming.
tasks.expected_outcome: A weekly performance report is created, highlighting that QC-01 had significant downtime and lower productivity.
